examples.input: The new artificial intelligence system developed by researchers at Stanford University has achieved remarkable results in natural language processing. The system, which uses advanced neural networks and deep learning techniques, can understand and generate human-like text with unprecedented accuracy. examples.input: Climate change continues to be one of the most pressing global challenges of our time. Scientists have documented rising global temperatures, melting polar ice caps, and increasing extreme weather events. The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) has warned that immediate action is needed to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Governments worldwide are implementing policies to transition to renewable energy sources and reduce carbon footprints. Individual actions, such as reducing energy consumption and supporting sustainable practices, also play a crucial role in addressing this crisis.
examples.output: Climate change requires immediate global action through government policies and individual efforts to reduce emissions and transition to renewable energy.
